Log in
March 2025 Edition
Zapier's latest
Explore the latest product updates and app news for building more powerful workflows in less time.
What's new
Customize approvals, eliminate bottlenecks
Tired of reviewing every Zap? Enterprise admins can now choose which apps need approval and add team members as approvers-giving everyone more time to build.
Get the details
Faster, more personalized Chatbots
Link buttons now support telephone and email fields. Plus, chatbots load faster, and new custom theming makes it even easier to align with your brand's style.
Watch the demo
Smarter AI, smoother workflows in Canvas
AI-powered Smart Steps anticipate your needs, and new top & bottom connectors help create clearer, more structured workflows.
See it in action
Spotlight
Track LinkedIn & Google Ads conversions for free
Automatically sync CRM events to LinkedIn and Google Ads to retarget, optimize, and measure revenue impact-with no task charges.
Optimize your ads for free →
Demo: Power your sales outreach with AI
Learn to use Zapier Agents to generate leads, prep for calls, and draft proposals directly in your CRM.
Watch the customer demo →
Blog post: Easily Automate with NetSuite
Experience seamless workflows when you sync NetSuite with your business apps using Zapier.
Learn how now →
New and noteworthy apps
Highlighting 9 new integrations and 14 updates, including…
Salesforce
The Create Record action now supports Platform Event records and even lets you create duplicates (if that's your thing).
Explore Salesforce integrations →
Bitly
Now you can create QR codes through your Zaps, so you can engage your audience and connect them to the right information.
Explore Bitly integrations →
Google Sheets
Automate your newest data front and center with the new action, Create Spreadsheet Row at Top.
Explore Google Sheets integrations →
Review Rover
Review Rover is an automated tool that manages review requests and monitors your online reputation in real time.
Explore Review Rover integrations →
Rize
Rize is an automatic time tracker that enhances focus and helps build effective work habits.
Explore Rize integrations →
Discover the latest
So many updates, so little space! Join the Zapier Community or visit our Help Center for even more product updates.
